headline: CPO is Moving From Hype to Backlog for LITE: More Upside Ahead?
summary: Lumentum sees CPO shift to contracted backlog, eyeing late-2027 scale-up as AI optics demand drives record revenue outlook.

headline: AI Optics Boom: What 1.6T Ramp Means for the LITE Stock's Prospect
summary: Lumentum sees 1.6T demand surge ahead of plan, boosting margins as tight laser supply and 200G lane mix shift reshape its profit profile.

raw.headline: AI Optics Boom: What 1.6T Ramp Means for the LITE Stock's Prospect

headline: Western Digital Doubles Down On AI Data Centers And Cleaner Balance Sheet
summary: Western Digital (NasdaqGS:WDC) has sold out its 2026 hard drive production capacity, with demand driven primarily by hyperscale AI data centers. The company is prioritizing enterprise customers over consumer markets and locking in long-term supply contracts with AI focused data center operators. Western Digital is exiting most of its remaining Sandisk stake through a multibillion dollar secondary offering and debt for equity exchange. Together, these moves shift Western Digital toward a more...

headline: 1 Unpopular Stock That Should Get More Attention and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: When Wall Street turns bearish on a stock, it’s worth paying attention. These calls stand out because analysts rarely issue grim ratings on companies for fear their firms will lose out in other business lines such as M&A advisory.
